Trade with a trusted broker today

See for yourself why Exness is the broker of choice for over 800,000 traders and 64,000 partners.

1-At Exness, 95% of withdrawals are processed instantly (under 1 minute). Once your funds leave our custody, it's up to your chosen payment provider to process the funds and credit your account.

2-Best spreads refers to average or max spreads offered by Exness, excluding agents’ commission for XAUUSD for the first two seconds after high-impact news, from January to May 2024, compared with five other large brokers.

3-Spreads may fluctuate and widen due to factors including market volatility, news releases, economic events, when markets open or close, and the type of instruments being traded.
